Text: Can u please upload the northeast corridor add-on when u have it?

The next upload will be, RailWorks - Addons Collectors Pack Edition 1, which was found to be faulty but all is repaired now, also NorthEast Corridor, Acela & AP22 will be included as late arrivals into the pack, i am looking to release this bundled with RailWorks 3 (Train Simulator 2012) this will include every Add-on by Steam, Armstrong Powerhouse & a variety from Iron Horse House. I look forwards to seeing you all in the near future as i am going to be taking a holiday for 1 month. Thanks everyone.
Thanks RailGamer. Really looking forward to it.
Thanks for the control cars! using them a whole lot! Would it be possible for you to post the North East Corridor expansion pack? Thanks again!
